SEARCH
Package com.example.eventease.data

Interface WaitlistRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
FirebaseWaitlistRepository
public interface WaitlistRepository
Repository interface for waitlist operations. Provides methods to join, leave, and check waitlist status for events. This interface follows the Repository pattern to abstract data access operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean>
    isJoined(String eventId, String uid)
    Checks if a user is currently on the waitlist for an event.
    com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>
    join(String eventId, String uid)
    Adds a user to the waitlist for an event.
    com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>
    leave(String eventId, String uid)
    Removes a user from the waitlist for an event.

  • Method Details

    • join

      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> join(String eventId, String uid)
      Adds a user to the waitlist for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique event identifier
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes when the user is added to the waitlist

    • isJoined

      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> isJoined(String eventId, String uid)
      Checks if a user is currently on the waitlist for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique event identifier
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes with true if the user is on the waitlist, false otherwise

    • leave

      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> leave(String eventId, String uid)
      Removes a user from the waitlist for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique event identifier
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes when the user is removed from the waitlist
